The button displays images no larger than [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPNowPlayingButtonMaximumImageSize]. If you use an animated image, this property returns the first image in the animation sequence.

# image

**Instance Property**

The image that the button displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var image: UIImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

The button displays images no larger than [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPNowPlayingButtonMaximumImageSize]. If you use an animated image, this property returns the first image in the animation sequence.
title: image
